name: json_pgn
description: Final PGN text including headers and moves

name: # desired_fields below are typical outputs you compute/materialize (reference names)
desired_start_time_epoch
description: Start time epoch from PGN UTC headers

name: desired_my_color
description: My color by matching configured username to PGN names

name: desired_my_outcome
description: My outcome from my result code

name: desired_opp_outcome
description: Opponent outcome from opp result code

name: desired_end_reason
description: Loser raw result (draw uses draw code)

name: desired_my_pregame_last
description: My pregame rating inferred from last per format

name: desired_my_delta_last
description: My delta based on last rating per format

name: desired_opp_pregame_last
description: Opponent pregame inferred from delta and opp end

name: desired_opp_delta_last
description: Opponent delta inferred as negative of my delta

name: desired_my_delta
description: Final delta choosing callback when non-zero

name: desired_opp_delta
description: Final delta choosing callback when non-zero
